title: Why isn't the firefox widget on my browser anymore and how do I get it back?
content: I had the firefox browser and it stopped working as well. I went to your website and hit download again. It removed my desktop icon and told me the file was broken. I downloaded from Microsoft store and now the only way I can get to it is through searching for it in my search bar. My widge is gone, and all my previous bookmarks and favorites have been removed. I understand I probably can't get back any of the old stuff, but I at least want my widget back on my homescreen. There is no where to add a shortcut, nor is there any option to add to desktop;.
creator: alexandranguzzi
